snippet: Scholars are completing a comprehensive online database of buildings by this Scottish master.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Online database of buildings by Scottish architect Charles Rennie Mackintosh is set to debut only months after his wing at Glasgow School of Art was destroyed by fire; Mead Art Museum at Amherst College hosts exhibition An Unblemished Mirror of Truth: Kyohei Inukai, Robert Brackman, and Portraits of American Tragedy.
lead_paragraph: Scholars are completing a comprehensive online database of buildings by this Scottish master.

headline.main: A New Forum for Charles Rennie Mackintosh’s Architecture
headline.print_headline: A New Forum for Charles Rennie Mackintosh’s Architecture
